standardAbilities.name: Weapon Attack
standardAbilities.description: Make a [MELEE MARTIAL ATTACK] against a creature using any bonuses your weapon provides. If your [ATTACK] exceeds or matches your targets [DODGE] it recieves damage depending on your Weapon.

standardAbilities.name: Desperate Attack
standardAbilities.description: Make a [MELEE MARTIAL ATTACK] against a creature. If your [ATTACK] exceeds or matches your targets [DODGE] it recieves physical damage equal to your two-handed martial damage but you yourself additionally suffer half that damage and that damage can't be reduced in any way.

actions.attack: explain abilities withthe weapon tag can use weapon bonuses, explain crits

standardReactions.name: Opportunity Attack
standardReactions.description: If a creature leaves your melee range you can make a Melee [ATTACK] against them.

standardReactions.name: Graceful Landing
standardReactions.description: If you fall down a large height you can use your reaction to perform a landing to reduce damage. Make an [AGI] [ATTRIBUTE TEST] and reduce the damage of your landing by half of that result.

standardReactions.name: Parry
standardReactions.description: When you are hit by a [MELEE ATTACK] you can use this reaction. Make a Weapon [MELEE MARTIAL ATTACK] if it matches or exceeds the [MELEE ATTACK] that targeted you, the damage from the [ATTACK] is reduced by 2 * ([AGI] + [MARTIAL LEVEL]) if weapon is wielded one-handed, or by 3 * ([AGI] + [MARTIAL LEVEL]) if weapon is wielded two-handed.

circumstancalBonuses.cover: small cover: unmodified roll (25%)1-5 will always hit cover + 2 [DODGE], medium cover: unmodified roll (50%) 1-10 will always hit cover + 4 [DODGE], large cover: unmodified roll (75%) 1-15 will always hit cover + 6 [DODGE]
